data.name: ContinueStory1
data.value: [color=#00F8F8]Spinda[color] should have things like that, [pause=10]but can you help me before you go to him please?

data.name: ContinueStory2
data.value: Oh, [pause=10]you're back. ♪ [pause=0]Can I still ask for your help? [pause=0]It's really-really important.

data.name: Tutor_Intro
data.value: Welcome, [pause=10]buddy. [pause=0]It'll cost you {0} to change your moves.

data.name: Tutor_Intro_Return
data.value: Anything else you wanna do here?

data.name: MENU_RECALL_SKILL
data.value: Relearn a Move

data.name: MENU_FORGET_SKILL
data.value: Forget a Move

data.name: MENU_INFO
data.value: Info

data.name: MENU_EXIT
data.value: Leave

data.name: Tutor_No_Money
data.value: Just hold on there a minute, [pause=10]buddy. [pause=0]You can't use my services if you don't have the cash on ya'.

data.name: Tutor_Info_001
data.value: Why're you tiltin' your head like that for... [pause=20]Oooh, [pause=10]you wanna know how my Link Shop works, [pause=10]right?

data.name: Tutor_Info_002
data.value: Here's the deal, [pause=10]if you wanna remember a move you want, [pause=10]I'm your Pokémon.

data.name: Tutor_Info_003
data.value: If you wanna remove a move because you don't like it or some other reason, [pause=10]I'm also your Pokémon.

data.name: Tutor_Goodbye
data.value: See you later, [pause=10]bud. [pause=0]If you need me, [pause=10]I'll be here!

data.name: Tutor_Remember_Who
data.value: Which one's remembering a move today?

data.name: Tutor_Cant_Remember
data.value: Uh, [pause=10]I don't want to be negative, [pause=10]but this one can't remember any other moves.

data.name: Tutor_Remember_What
data.value: What move is {0} going to relearn?

data.name: Tutor_Remember_Begin
data.value: Alright! [pause=0]Leave it to me!

data.name: Tutor_Remember_Success
data.value: Pow! [pause=0]Just like that, [pause=10]{0} just remembered how to use {1}!

data.name: Tutor_Remember_Replace
data.value: Woah, [pause=10]it looks like their moveset is completely full! [pause=10]You might want to replace a move first.

data.name: Tutor_Forget_Who
data.value: Which one's going to forget somethin' today?

data.name: Tutor_Cant_Forget
data.value: Buddy, [pause=10]it wouldn't be a smart thing to know no moves. [pause=0]You need at least one.

data.name: Tutor_Forget_What
data.value: {0} is going to forget... [pause=20]what move, [pause=10]exactly?

data.name: Tutor_Forget_Begin
data.value: Ok, [pause=10]it's time to get to work.

data.name: Tutor_Forget_Success
data.value: Bang! [pause=0]Just like that, [pause=10]{0} forgot how to use {1}!

data.name: Tutor_Info_004
data.value: Unfortunately, [pause=10]moves have been acting weird lately, [pause=10]so I can't link your moves right now.
